other_tests.findings: Trace right pleural effusion. Bibasilar atelectasis. Normal liver with a tiny T2 hyperintense cystic lesion near the dome, compatible with a hepatic cyst. No intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Multiple gallstones with gallbladder-wall edema and pericholecystic fluid. Spleen enlarged with multiple unchanged T2 mildly hyperintense lesions. Normal adrenal glands and kidneys with bilateral T2 hyperintense cystic lesions. No obstruction in gastrointestinal tract. Multiple prominent retroperitoneal lymph nodes, likely reactive.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Similar to prior CT findings, although exact prior date not specified.
